checker.matching
Class WordList

java.lang.Object
  checker.matching.WordList

public class WordList
extends java.lang.Object

WordList holds a list of words and their positions (row and column) in a file. This class is used as a helper class with Diff to be able to do diff operations on word basis.

Users of this class expect the words to appear in original order, so row and column information are only used for accessing the original data. They are not used for sorting.

Author:
Lauri Koponen

addAll

public void addAll(WordList wordlist)
Adds the contents of another word list at the end of this list, preserving word order.

Parameters:
wordlist - a word list to add to this list

isTag

private static boolean isTag(java.lang.String word)
Check if a word is a tag. If the word starts with a "<" and ends with ">", it is assumed to be a tag.

Parameters:
word - Word to check
Returns:
True if the word is a tag, false otherwise

tidy

public static java.lang.String tidy(java.lang.String word)
Clean up word. Removes non-alphanumeric characters if not a tag. Words identified as tags are not processed.

Parameters:
word - Word to tidy
Returns:
Cleaning result

splitWords

public static WordList splitWords(java.lang.String in,
                                  int row,
                                  int startcol)
Split a String to words and calculate word positions. The given string appears on line 'row' in the text file and begins at column 'startcol'. Words with no alphanumeric characters are not included in the word list.

Parameters:
in - the string to split
row - line number for this string
startcol - start column for this string
Returns:
WordList containing the words in the string

commentsToWords

public static WordList commentsToWords(java.util.ArrayList<CommentLine> comments)
Comment an ArrayList to WordList.

Parameters:
comments - the comments to convert
Returns:
WordList containing the words of the comments

licenseToWords

public static WordList licenseToWords(License license)
Convert a License to a WordList.

Parameters:
license - the license to convert
Returns:
WordList containing the words of the license

Find a word starting at startrow, startcol.

Parameters:
startrow - Word starting row
startcol - Word starting column
Returns:
Index into words array.

                             int startcol,

Parameters:
